Headline: #78 Montrose Temporary Reroute at Montrose/Western
ShortDescription: 78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted via Montrose, Western, Irving Park, California, and Montrose due to, street blockage at Montrose/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Montrose, Western, Irving Park, California, and Montrose due to, street blockage at Montrose/Western.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Northbound Reroute near Damen/18th
ShortDescription: NB 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 18th, Ashland, Roosevelt and Damen due to, street blockage near Damen/18th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 18th, Ashland, Roosevelt and Damen due to, street blockage near Damen/18th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Reroute at 55th/Lawndale
ShortDescription: 55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via Garfield, Kedzie, 59th and Pulaski: due to, street blockage near 55th/Lawndale.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via Garfield, Kedzie, 59th and Pulaski: due to, street blockage near 55th/Lawndale.
